plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fiction, as most of the books listed are novels. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as many of the books focus on the development of the protagonist. The user's favourite setting is likely to be modern, as most of the books are set in the 20th century. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be literary, as many of the books are known for their complex language and themes. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as most of the books are full-length novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be coming-of-age, as many of the books deal with the themes of growing up and self-discovery. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow and contemplative, as many of the books take time to explore the characters and their surroundings. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as many of the books use this perspective to give a broad view of the characters and their world. The user's favourite themes are likely to be identity, relationships, and self-discovery.
